name: Space Rangers Ep. 46 - the Devil within
name_original: Space Rangers Ep. 46 - the Devil within
description:
In a galaxy near you, you are to boldly go where no one else dares to go.

You will play the part of special agent Yaz KreJonns of the Space Rangers, the organization that is called in when regular Star fleet is not enough.

This time something strange is happening on a mining planetoid. The miners has gone missing.. and then the team of soldiers sent in to find them.

-------

If you like this game you might also like

https://per-k-grok.itch.io/space-rangers-sob-ep52-...

----

A point and click adventure game made with AGS.

A Per K Grok game

Additional ideas, dialogues and testing by Gertrud Bondesson, aka Blondbraid.

All songs in this game copyright 2010-2011 Deceased Superior Technician.
